about_the_game:
Flan's original soundtrack with 18 in-game songs!
Available in .mp3!

The song data of the sound track is generated as "Flan_OST" in the Flan folder in your SteamLibrary.

【DLC in Music】

boss(Flan)
boss_loop(Flan)
ED(Flan)

ED2(Flan)
Lastboss_loop(Flan)

title(Flan)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3230M or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 720M or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Flan's original soundtrack with 18 in-game songs! Available in .mp3! The song data of the sound track is generated as "Flan_OST" in the Flan folder in your SteamLibrary.
